sentence.Network_en: Forests have given place to tillage and pasture.
sentence.Network_cn: 原先的森林已被耕地和牧场所取代.

sentence.Network_en: Pastures cannot be justified solely because of their contribution to succeeding tillage crops.
sentence.Network_cn: 不能仅仅因为草场提供成功的耕种作物,就认为它是合理的.

sentence.Network_en: Territory by long - term soil tillage cultivation, a higher degree of maturation.
sentence.Network_cn: 境内土壤经 长期 耕垦, 熟化程度较高.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 耕字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 〖till;cultivate〗 耕种 〖tillage〗 耕作 gēngdì 耕读.
农业词汇英语翻译(O-T) ... tideland soil science 潮间地土壤学 tillage 耕耘 tillage pan 犁底层.
地理专业词汇英语翻译(S-Z) ... till plain 冰碛平原 tillage 耕地 tilled land 耕地.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... clearage 清除，清理 tillage 耕作，耕种 wastage 耗损.

list.abs: 表土耕作(surface tillage)或称次级耕作 ( secondary tillage),是配合基本耕作措施使用的入土较浅、作用强度较小,旨在破碎土块、平整土地、消灭杂草的一类土壤耕作措施.
deep subsoil water 深层土壤水deep tillage 深耕deep weathering 深部风化
shallow seeding 浅播shallow tillage 浅耕shape pruning 整形修枝
contour strip cropping 等高带状种植contour tillage 等高耕作contour value 等高线数值

means.word_mean: 1. arable land that is worked by plowing and sowing and raising crops
2. the cultivation of soil for raising crops
